Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dave Stewart (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1985, off Steve Mura (OAK)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1985, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,071,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1986, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,071,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1987, hitting .600 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,071,429 through salary arbitration...
Hit for the cycle against Detroit on 5/20/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1988, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/8/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/9/1989 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Toronto on 4/11/1990...
